title: Highest Inflation Rate
description: In 2016, Venezuela experienced an inflation rate of 254.95%, one of the highest in the world.

title: Lowest Military Spending
description: In 2023, Venezuela's military expenditure was only 3,917,057 USD, one of the lowest globally.

title: Longest Compulsory Education Duration
description: As of 2023, Venezuela mandates 17 years of compulsory education, one of the longest durations worldwide.
